attributes.background:
Donald Trump's recent actions have shown complete contempt for international diplomacy and disrespect for our nation.
I don't want to live in a country where foreign leaders walk all over us.
We have not allowed it to happen before; we must not allow it to happen now.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "break diplomatic relations".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
